Application Instructions
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
RSPCA Assured scheme membership
Thank you for your interest in becoming a member of RSPCA Assured.
You can continue your application with three easy steps:
Read the relevant standards and check that you meet them
Read the RSPCA Assured membership agreement, including SCI scheme regulations
Complete our online application form and then pay online or by BACS
You will need your Defra/CPH, EC Registration, BRC or SALSA numbers as applicable. You will also need the RSPCA Assured membership numbers of relevant suppliers.
Apply
Our RSPCA Assured Member Information will tell everything you need to know about your assessment and becoming a member of RSPCA Assured.
If you have any questions please don’t hesitate to contact our member services team on 01403 800141 – or email help@rspcaassured.org.uk – and one of the team will be happy to help.
Yours sincerely
Membership services RSPCA Assured
